author: .fjl
content: We just tested a bit and it looks like go-ethereum, lighthouse and trinity implement the same spec and can all talk to each other

author: .fjl
content: I tried using the nimbus testnet1 bootnode and it doesn't respond to the handshake correctly, the clients never progress beyond whoareyou in the handshake
